<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Golden Legion Epaulet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=499)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn epaulet

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These gleaming golden epaulets are issued to Eagle Knight officers and worn as part of the uniform. While they can be enchanted to provide a variety of effects, the Golden Legion epaulet remains the most common.

<document level="2" id="action-298" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
